indicates the mail server has accepted the command, but does not yet take any action. A confirmation message is required.
Mail server has completed the task successfully without errors
System status, or system help reply
User not local; will forward to <forward-path>
Cannot VRFY user, but will accept message and attempt
indicates the mail server has understood the request, but requires further information to complete it
indicates the mail server has encountered a temporary failure. If the command is repeated without any change, it might be completed. Try again, it may help!
<domain> Service not available, closing transmission channel
Requested mail action not taken: mailbox unavailable
Requested action aborted: local error in processing
Requested action not taken: insufficient system storage
TLS not available due to temporary reason
indicates the mail server has encountered a fatal error. Your request can't be processed
Syntax error in parameters or arguments
Requested action not taken: mailbox unavailable
Requested mail action aborted: exceeded storage allocation
Requested action not taken: mailbox name not allowed
